  | |

  | while parsing `<json_path>`

  | while parsing `<json_path>`

1 | $[0, 1, 2 4]

  | |

  | |          
  | while parsing `<json_path>`

  | -      ^ expected <QuotedString>
  | |       
  | while parsing `<json_path>`
